explanation: The neighbor map p included vertical neighbors (e.g. 1:(2, 4)), so the program could report 'Yes' for vertically adjacent squares. I replaced the p dictionary so each key lists only its horizontal neighbors (1-2, 2-3, 4-5, 5-6, 7-8, 8-9). This fixes the incorrect adjacency mapping; it's equivalent in intent to checks like B-A==1 with a row-boundary guard (see diff patterns that check B-A==1).
